gerimas kama ha arakku bima pilibadawa rasawath wistharayak mejar thomas skinar wisin 1851 brithanya parlimenthuwe pawathi therim karaka sabhawak wetha idiripath kerini.ema therim karaka sabhawa wuye 1848 mathale nidahas aragalaya sambandhawaya.1820 di thama udarata parawal lakunu kirimata giya awadhiye udarata ekadu minisek gerimas kama ho arakku bima nokala athara 1847 wana wita gerimas kamatath pidigena ena goyama ukasata thaba mudal labagena arakku bimatath abbahi wimath ohu wisin dakwa atha. 1847 di anthani olipant agra winishchayakara thana wisin landan yatath wijitha karyalayenda anumathiya labagena bhikshun wahansela karana lada shashthra iganwim ha aarawul wisada samathaya kirima nithiyen thahanam karana ladi.eya pasal guruwarunge ha usawi winishchayakaruwange rajakariya bawa adhirajya aanduwe thiranaya wiya.
